mission:
Forge a Great sword of any material.

mission:

10 tomatos.

title: Redwood Warrior.
mission: Create 5 kunai of Red iron(1 iron ingot + 1 copper ingot = 1 rediron)

mission:
Create a shortsword of copper.
+ shortsword blade
+ Handle
+ Guard
+ Pommel

title: Hebios Collectionaire.
mission: Find and bring back 40 hebios guards. (The little frog faced things at the Bandit camps.)

mission: Mine 100 iron.

mission: Bring back 15 turrabada eyes.

mission: Fill 2 grass bags with garbage.

mission:
Create a wooden shield.

title: DT's lil helper.
mission: Create a health potion and give it to someone in need with proof.

title: Our little worker.
mission: Create a pickaxe of any material, You get to keep it. + handle.

title: Chop Chop Chop.
mission:
Create a basic axe + handle, doesn't matter what material.
You keep it!

title: Village Protector.
mission:
Create a wooden shield. Any kind, all three shield pieces and a handle. you HAVE to make it yourself.
You keep the shield!

title: Carpenters Honey.
mission: Chop 250 wood.

title: Helpful Hand.
mission:
Create a leather bag.
Show this to an admin, and then donate it to someone that still has a straw bag. If you can't find any, give it to the admin to delete.

title: Craftsman.
mission:
Create 2 pouches.
**YOU KEEP THIS.**

title: Restaurant Worker.
mission: Create 20 bowls.

title: Casino Worker.
mission: Create 10 dice.

title: Under the High King.
mission:
Create a Greatsword of any material. Handle + Guard + Blade.

mission: Cook 3 gourds of blueberry wine (4 blueberries) and serve them to the hungry.

title: Apollo.
mission: Create 3 bows.
